amendment.description: Amendment requires that the final tranche of arrearage payments to the United Nations and other designated agencies be contingent upon a certification by the Secretary of State that the United States has regained its seat on the United Nations Commission on Human Rights.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 107-62 to establish the additional preconditions of the U.S. return to the U.N. Human Rights Commission and to a determination on the voting practices in the U.N. to the release of $244 million in previously appropriated funds to pay U.S. arrearages to the U.N. and other international organzations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 165, 1 Present (Roll no. 107).
